title: My game is freezing but my ping and fps are fine
body: So around Saturday my ping went from 45 to 76 and it kind of stayed there . I didn't think much of it but after like 5 game I started to have random spikes where I would lose control of my champ and everything would freeze . after that the game would quickly rush me back to what I missed which normally was me dyeing cause I couldn't do anything during the spike. I have tried using the hextec repair I have restarted my connection I have also tested it its saying my ping is fine but when I open league and play I have 70+ ping which is still green and I only freeze/lag in league pls help.

replies.body:
What you're experiencing sounds just like *Packet Loss* or *High Packet Buffering*. These issues often occur if there are issues along your route to the servers. I'd like you to first ensure all your local network settings are peachy by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Should you still experience these issues after taking those steps, we can investigate further.

Let me know the results of those changes.
